attributes.action: Stop the closure of the Learie Constantine Centre
attributes.additional_details: Sign the petition to stop the closure of the iconic Learie Constantine centre in willesden. This Staple of the community has stood for for fourty two years and has served the community young and old continuously and with great consistency. It is a staple for the community to keep this building alive as it has a history far reaching and synonymous with the development of the area and the migrant Caribbean community when they first settled in the UK.

rejection.details: A matter for the Local Authority?
